game.name: Heavy Burden
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "시시푸스가 산 정상으로 올라갈 때 어떤 기분일까요? 돌의 무게, 태양의 소름, 가파른 오르막으로 지치지만 그는 여전히 정상을 향해 올라갑니다. 거기에서 그를 기다리고 있는 게 무엇일까요?"
game.shortDescriptionEn: How does Sisyphus feel as he climbs to the top of the mountain? Tired from the weight of the stone, the scorching sun, and the steep climbs, he nevertheless continues on his way up. What awaits him there?

reviewHighlights.text: Work and work, again and again Like sysuphys to reach the top of the surroundings. It's like a Only Up parody in grey tones
This game is worth its price, but it is advisable to wait for a sale before purchasing it. The soundtracks are excellent
